name: mbti-lkeap-ai-proxy
description: Backend proxy for Lkeap AI API integration with DeepSeek models

scripts.debug:check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('LKEAP_API_KEY set:', !!process.env.LKEAP_API_KEY); console.log('LKEAP_BASE_URL:', process.env.LKEAP_BASE_URL || 'default'); console.log('LKEAP_DEFAULT_MODEL:', process.env.LKEAP_DEFAULT_MODEL || 'default');"
